headline: Master AngularJS Book
text: Make the most out of AngularJS by understanding the AngularJS philosophy and applying it to real life development tasks

headline: AngularJS - O'Reilly Media
text: Guided by two engineers who worked on AngularJS at Google, you’ll walk through the framework’s key features, and then build a working AngularJS app

headline: Flat UI Pro
text: Flat UI Pro is made on the basis of Twitter Bootstrap in a stunning flat-style, and the kit also includes a PSD version for designers.

headline: An AngularJS Andriod App
text: Diary & Journal is an hybrid app made with AngularJS and phonegap/cordova, looks and feels native
